desc: Made with growing kids in mind, Designed by Nature brings you a healthy, real food and nutritious meal over the less-nutritious conventional options. Our formulas are made using a low-heat process in order to preserve as much nutrition and flavour as possible.

layout.text: Now Kosher Certified! You can count on our formulas being made following the strict Kosher guidelines of cleanliness, purity and quality. Made with natural, real food ingredients. Our goats milk is the perfect meal for your growing child.
